name: Birthday Calendar
description: Do you forget about your friends and colleagues birthdays? Hard to memorize all those dates? No time to prepare great presents beforehand? If so, you will enjoy this app! It will remind you every important date.  The app contains no ads and it is completely free. It is easy to use, unlike bulky calendars and organizers. You will be able to find desired date quickly within the app, without annoying ads and unnecessary complications. Yes, social networks can remind you some birthdays. But do your friends always fill in the birth date field? Does your granny have an account in social network? Simply store all the information in one place. Also you can always attach a photo to person and write down ideas for future presents.  Do not worry for information safety. This app does not send personal information to the Web. We do our best to keep birthday records safe. Some features require additional permissions: phonebook access - to import contacts network access - to import friends from social networks Vkontakte & Odnoklassniki camera access - to add photos to birthday records   Main features ability to import friends from social networks vk.com and ok.ru ability to import contacts from address book displaying zodiac sign for every person ability to set photo for every person quick congratulating for imported persons notes and presents ideas storage modern material design small APK size no ads  Translation You can help us translate this app into your language here: https://www.localize.im/v/rz
